title: Role-Based Authentication Success
description: Verify that users can successfully log in with valid credentials for all defined roles including SuperAdmin, Manager, Engineer, Technician, Customer, and Guard with 2FA enabled.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username/email and password for each user role
Complete 2FA verification step
Click login button
Verify successful login and access to role-appropriate dashboard

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that each user role can only access data and features permitted by their role and tenant isolation rules are enforced strictly.

steps.description: Log in as each user role
Attempt to access restricted pages, data records, or perform unauthorized actions
Ensure access is denied and appropriate error messages are displayed
Attempt to access another tenant's data
Verify data isolation by denying cross-tenant data access

title: Dashboard KPIs Load and Update Correctly
description: Verify that the dashboard loads KPIs, production charts, and fault statistics for each role within 2 seconds and data is filtered correctly by tenant and role.

steps.description: Log in as Manager, Engineer, and Customer
Navigate to the main dashboard page
Validate that all KPIs and charts load within 2 seconds
Verify displayed data corresponds only to the user's tenant and role permissions

title: Fault Creation and Lifecycle Management
description: Test full fault report lifecycle including creation (manual and automatic), status updates, assignment to technicians, photo uploads, resolution tracking, and closure with notification triggers.

steps.description: Log in as Technician
Create a new fault report with site, plant, category, priority, description, and photos via mobile and dashboard
Verify fault creation success and notification sent to Manager
Log in as Manager and assign fault to Technician
Log in as Technician, update fault status, add material usage and photos documenting progress
Close the fault and confirm notification is sent to Manager
Ensure fault record lifecycle is completely tracked with correct status and attachments

title: Maintenance Scheduling and Completion Tracking
description: Verify scheduling, checklist completion, documentation upload, and status updates for electrical and mechanical maintenance tasks.

steps.description: Log in as Manager or Engineer
Schedule a maintenance task with detailed checklist items for a plant
Assign the task to Technician
Log in as Technician, update checklist progress, and upload relevant documentation/photos
Complete task and update status to finished
Verify all maintenance data is accurately saved and notifications are sent as per workflow

title: Power Plant Management Data Accuracy
description: Test input, update, and display of power plant configurations including capacity, inverter and panel details, production data, and monthly reports with geographic associations.

steps.description: Log in as Engineer
Create a new solar power plant with all required details
Input production data manually and validate against system
Generate monthly production and performance reports and check PDF and Excel exports
Verify data accuracy, report correctness, and geographic map integration

title: Inventory Control and Alert System
description: Ensure stock movements are logged, minimum threshold alerts trigger at correct levels, and inventory links correctly with faults and maintenance records.

steps.description: Log in as Manager or Technician
Record stock usage associated with a fault or maintenance task
Reduce inventory below minimum threshold
Check that minimum stock alerts are generated and visible to responsible roles
Review stock movement history for accuracy and completeness

title: Multi-Device and Multi-Channel Notification System
description: Verify that push, email, in-app, and WhatsApp notifications deliver reliably to devices based on user role, device type, and notification preferences.

steps.description: Trigger events such as fault creation, fault assignment, maintenance completion, and shift notifications
Verify notifications are received on all subscribed devices and channels per user role
Test notification preference settings (enable/disable channels) and validate delivery accordingly

title: Subscription Enforcement and Quota Limits
description: Validate subscription limits by testing user, site, and storage quota enforcement for trial and paid plan tiers with proper messaging and restriction of over-limit actions.

steps.description: Log in as company admin with trial plan and attempt to add users, sites, and upload files exceeding quota limits
Verify blocked actions with clear usage limit messages
Upgrade subscription plan and confirm that quotas are increased and previously blocked actions succeed

title: Mobile App Offline Data Entry and Start Performance
description: Ensure mobile app supports offline limited data entry for faults and maintenance and starts within 3 seconds on iOS devices using Capacitor.

steps.description: Launch mobile app on iOS
Check app launch time is under 3 seconds
Disable network connection
Create new fault and maintenance records
Verify data is stored locally and syncs upon connection restoration

title: PDF and Excel Report Generation Validation
description: Test generation of fault, maintenance, and production reports with correct data ranges and export to PDF and Excel formats reflecting selected filters.

steps.description: Filter records on dashboard by date and other criteria
Export filtered data to PDF and Excel reports
Verify reports accurately reflect selected data and formats without errors

title: Data Privacy and Compliance Verification
description: Ensure all personal data handling complies with KVKK and GDPR, audit logs record critical changes, and data deletion requests behave correctly.

steps.description: Create, update, and delete personal data as various user roles
Verify audit logs capture all critical data changes with timestamps and user information
Request data export and deletion for a customer per GDPR/KVKK rights
Confirm data export correctness and proper deletion or anonymization

title: UI Accessibility and Turkish Language Support
description: Validate that the application UI meets WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards and fully supports the Turkish language across all screens and components.

steps.description: Navigate through all key pages and components
Run automated and manual accessibility checks to confirm WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
Verify all text, date formats, and UI elements are properly localized for Turkish language

title: Shift Management and Guard Notification Workflow
description: Verify shift reports submission by guards with event notes, photos, time tracking, and alerts via mobile interface and proper notifications to Supervisors.

steps.description: Log in as Guard on mobile
Submit shift report including notes, photos, and time logs
Confirm report submission completes successfully
Verify notifications are sent to Manager and Guard role devices

title: User Profile Management and Settings Update
description: Test user ability to update profile information, change passwords, configure notification preferences, and personalize application settings including theme.

steps.description: Log in as any user role
Navigate to profile and settings pages
Update profile fields, change password, and toggle theme between dark and light modes
Modify notification preferences and save changes
Verify all changes are saved and reflected in the UI immediately
